data.value: Ordinary inner product of vectors for 1-D arrays (without complex conjugation), in higher dimensions a sum product over the last axes.
For vectors (1-D arrays) it computes the ordinary inner-product::
may be scalars, in which case::
are nonscalar, their last dimensions must match.
are nonscalar and their last dimensions have different sizes.
are both scalars or both 1-D arrays then a scalar is returned; otherwise an array is returned.
